list_definition.definition: (of eg a cushion, ball etc) that can be filled with air for use

list_ex_of_english: Thanks to the inflatable rafts which were carried, no lives were lost, but the boat went down in ten minutes.
All we want are inflatable shibboleths.
Will he so alter the rule as to ensure that inflatable rafts should be not only inflatable but covered inflatable rafts?
Certain approved types of inflatable liferafts of foreign manufacture are accepted under the rules.
When necessary, the radio investigation service inspects radio installations on craft moored offshore using vessels hired for the purpose, or its own inflatable dinghy.
Inflatable booms and skimmer systems for containment and recovery of oil from the sea surface are also available.
I have questioned the proposal that all lifejackets should be inflatable.

A collection of various interchangeable and expendable gizmos, the house included inflatable beds and chairs that doubled as hovercrafts and multi-purpose robots that could distinguish between flavours of canned soup.
